segments.text: I'm going to New York for the first time , but I don't have a tour guide . Can you give me any suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's a service called ' A friend in New York ' . It's a personal tour guide service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's interesting . What does it do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You give them your information by answering a questionnaire and they will create a perfect trip for you according to your budget .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . Where can I get the questionnaire ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can easily download it from their website .
segments.speaker: S2
